DOC.brief_summary: The intrauterine device ( IUD ) long-term birth control method demonstrate high contraceptive efficacy effectiveness due high compliance , adherence persistence use . The IUD global prevalence rate around 14 % woman reproductive age . Side effect main reason IUD use discontinuation . The common reason copper IUD discontinuation increase menstrual bleeding , irregular bleeding dysmenorrhea , whereas case 52mg Levonorgestrel IUD irregular bleeding amenorrhea . In 2014 , new hormonal IUD containing13,5mg Levonorgestrel market Spain . There many study compare two Levonorgestrel IUDs . However , study compare IUD 13,5mg Levonorgestrel classic copper IUDs . The hypothesis trial Levonorgestrel ( 13,5mg ) IUD user menstrual bleeding pattern few day Copper 380 mm2 IUD user . This Phase IV , national single-center , randomize 1 : 1 , single-blind , comparative , parallel control trial .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Compare Menstrual Bleeding Profile Among JaydessÂ® Copper Intrauterine Device ( IUD ) Users . COLIBRI STUDY ( Copper Levonorgestrel IUD Barcelona Research Initiative ) .
DOC.criteria: Healthy female subject . Parous nulliparous woman age 18 45 year ask IUD contraceptive method . History regular cyclic menstrual period range 21 35 day nonexcessive menstrual blood loss . Absolute contraindication IUD use , accord World Health Organization Medical Eligibility Criteria . Contraindications use 13,5 LNGIUD . Anemia . Use short longacting preparation contain sex hormone within 12 week IUD insertion . Known bleed irregularity . Pregnancy breastfeeding .
